title: Gharana
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Take-out, Mexican, Indo-Chinese
description: Vegetarian restaurant in Shambhu Hotel. Offers Indian, Chinese, and continental cuisine. 5 minutes away from the taxi stand. The Mall is at about 10-12 minutes leisurely walking distance. You will need to climb a short flight of stairs from the road to reach the reception level.
